issue.title: [C++] Upgrade bundled zlib to 1.2.12
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16078](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16078). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
From latets NVD report <https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2018-25032>
zlib before 1.2.12 allows memory corruption when deflating (i.e., when compressing) if the input has many distant matches.
